name: The Lonely Robot
description:
Suck up as many objects as you can, but be careful not to fall off the edge of the map or you'll have to start all over!

Controls

Movement - WASD

Jump - Space

Vacuum - L

Sprint - Left Shift

Developer:

Joshua Beaty

www.joshuabeaty.dev

Music Provided by Kevin MacLeod

https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/
